summary: The diff implements REQ-83, REQ-84, and REQ-85 by adding Edit and Delete actions to PatientListPanel with touch-friendly controls. Edit opens PatientEditorDialog in edit mode, Delete triggers PatientDeleteConfirmDialog with cascading deletion handled by deletePatient store action. Touch targets are 44x44 points with clear icon labels (Pencil, Trash2). All acceptance criteria appear satisfied based on the available diff evidence.
